EstablishmentDetail.RightToReply: <p> I agree with the inspection results but at the time of the inspection, our food operation was deemed too low risk to merit inclusion in the &#39;Scores on the Doors&#39; scheme and there were very few issues found. The scheme has now changed, meaning we are included but with a low score. Any issues highlighted have been addressed and a revisit and rescore has been applied for.</p>
